articles.title: Disney guests get stuck on popular 'It's a small world' water ride for an hour due to malfunction - Daily Mail
articles.description: The TikTok clip shows one boat at full capacity slowly sinking into the ride's water. The woman sharing the video said people were forced to listen to the 'It's a Small World' song for an hour while being stuck.
articles.content:
Tourists were stuck for more than an hour at Disney World's 'It's A Small World' water-based boat ride due to a technical malfunction, a video gone viral shows.
